name: Fast-Food
description:
Fast-Food is an open-world, mission-based gameplay that revolves around the food delivery service in the country during the pandemic lockdown. As the driver for Fast-Food, you must walk through the livelihood of the delivery service - buy and obtain food, deliver it to the house that ordered it and get that sweet commission money, all while respecting the road and town safety protocols and keeping up with your own, life and quotas. 

Developers: Unicorn Studios (Matthew Belen, Benson Leong, Renzo Romano, Kyle Raphael Santos, Kit Endaya)
